variants.Description in input context: This variant is predicted to alter amyloid precursor protein processing.
This variant is associated with increased Aβ42 levels.

Material used.Material Name: HEK293 cells transfected with APP variants
Material used.Description: HEK293 cells were transfected with plasmids expressing the APP variants. Conditioned media was collected for ELISA.

Readout description.Result Description: ELISA revealed a significant increase in the Aβ42/Aβ40 ratio in conditioned media from cells expressing the c.670G>A variant compared to wild-type APP.
ELISA showed a substantial increase in total Aβ levels in conditioned media from cells expressing the c.1048A>T variant compared to wild-type APP. The ratio of Aβ42/Aβ40 was similar.

Biological replicates.Description: Each condition was tested in triplicate biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was assayed in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Cells expressing a known pathological APP mutation were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Cells transfected with empty vector served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test with Bonferroni correction was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Aβ42/Aβ40 ratio below 0.1, Total Aβ levels below 50pg/ml

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Aβ42/Aβ40 ratio above 0.2, Total Aβ levels above 100pg/ml
